Title: Relates to the liability of payroll processing companies
Summary: Relates to the liability of payroll processing companies; provides that payroll processing companies that intentionally and wrongfully prevent the distribution of payroll shall be liable to employees that failed to receive an expected payment for an amount up to three times the expected amount; provides an action to recover damages may be maintained as a class action.
LawCode: Add ยง11-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to the liability of payroll processing companies
